models.name: library_management_guestusers
models.description: Guest user role representing unauthenticated users who can add, view, and search books. This table stores minimal identity information for guest users. It serves as a primary identity entity without authentication credentials. This entity is primarily to support access control in the Actors domain, isolated from main business entities to ensure clean domain separation.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest user record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest user record was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp allowing recovery of guest user records.

models.name: library_management_books
models.description: Books catalog storing title, author, and uniquely validated ISBN information for the library. Supports guest user addition, viewing, and partial title search. Includes timestamps for creation and update with soft delete support. ISBN is unique to prevent duplicates.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Title of the book, must be a non-empty string.

plainFields.name: author
plainFields.description: Author of the book, must be a non-empty string.

plainFields.name: isbn
plainFields.description: Unique ISBN code of the book conforming to ISBN-10 or ISBN-13 format.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the book record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the book record was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the book record was soft deleted, if applicable.
